Title: Wizard Battle
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Mark Banker (story by), Patrick McHale (story by), Kent Osborne (story by), Pendleton Ward (story by), Ako Castuera, Jesse Moynihan
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Tom Kenny, Hynden Walch
Plot: The Ice King enters a battle of wizards from all over the Land of Ooo, to win a kiss from Princess Bubblegum--which Finn and Jake look to prevent.
